item.title: Introducing Koga (Hugo Theme)
item.description: “Koga” is a Hugo theme that I, Yu Koga created from scratch (Don’t judge me for naming it after myself). So this article is not an introduction about myself, but instead it is a basic tutorial on how to use the Koga theme. Prerequisites Basic knowledge on how to use the command line Initial Steps Install Hugo If you have not installed Hugo yet, do that now by running the following commands:
